data.title: International Business Exchange Program
data.text:
The IBEX Application for Fall 2025 will open in Fall 2024.

As a junior or senior in NYU Stern's IBEX (International Business Exchange) Program, you will have the chance to discover the academic, cultural, and social life of another country by directly enrolling in another top business school abroad. Through partnerships around the world, IBEX allows you to continue focusing on your business education while experiencing all the benefits of international study.

What are the benefits?

Take a full semester of business courses abroad.

Maintain your focus on the business world by experiencing different approaches to business in a foreign country. Courses can be approved for Stern elective credit, non-Stern elective credit or toward completing degree requirements. Full academic advising support ensures you stay on track for graduation.

Expand your network.

Network and study with top business students from around the world and make connections that will serve you well for the rest of your career in today’s increasingly global marketplace.

Show future employers you’re a global player.

Enhance your understanding and appreciation of global diversity, develop the sophistication to navigate different cultures, and show future employers you have what it takes to work on global teams.

Stand out.

Differentiate yourself with your unique international academic experiences and international network.

Additional Semester Study Away Opportunities
